subject: [LH] new mash-up
body:
I. wouldn't be surprised to learn that you all know about this one 
already, but it's new to him: a mash-up by DJ Magnet of Kate Bush's 
original RUTH mixed with Placebo's, together with a Pet Shop Boys 
track.

-- Andrew (IED)
   S      S       I
